entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 08:56 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
